verses.verse: וּכְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <WH6419> u-che-hit-pal-Lel had prayed עֶזְרָא֙ <WH5830> 'ez-Ra Now when Ezra וּכְ֨הִתְוַדֹּת֔וֹ <WH3034> u-Che-hit-vad-do-To, and when he had confessed בֹּכֶה֙ <WH1058> bo-Cheh weeping וּמִתְנַפֵּ֔ל <WH5307> u-mit-nap-Pel, and casting himself down לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God נִקְבְּצוּ֩ <WH6908> nik-be-Tzu there assembled אֵלָ֨יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El unto him out of Israel קָהָ֣ל <WH6951> ka-Hal congregation רַב־ <WH7227> rav- great מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> me-'Od, a very אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH582> 'a-na-Shim of men וְנָשִׁים֙ <WH802> ve-na-Shim and women וִֽילָדִ֔ים <WH3206> vi-la-Dim, and children כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for בָכ֥וּ <WH1058> va-Chu wept הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am for the people הַרְבֵּה־ <WH7235> har-beh- very בֶֽכֶה׃ <WH1059> Ve-cheh. sore ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעַן֩ <WH6030> vai-ya-'An answered שְׁכַנְיָ֨ה <WH7935> she-chan-Yah And Shechaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son יְחִיאֵ֜ל <WH3171> ye-chi-'El of Jehiel מִבְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei [one] of the sons; עֹולָם 'o-lam כעֵילָם֙ <WH5867> 'ei-Lam Elam קוַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said לְעֶזְרָ֔א <WH5830> le-'ez-Ra, unto Ezra אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we מָעַ֣לְנוּ <WH4603> ma-'Al-nu We have trespassed בֵאלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> ve-lo-Hei-nu, against our God וַנֹּ֛שֶׁב <WH3427> van-No-shev and have taken נָשִׁ֥ים <WH802> na-Shim wives נָכְרִיּ֖וֹת <WH5237> na-che-ri-Yot strange מֵעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> me-'am-Mei of the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- yet now there is מִקְוֶ֥ה <WH4723> mik-Veh hope לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El in Israel עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- spite זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> Zot. So

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now נִֽכְרָת־ <WH3772> nich-rot- Now therefore let us make בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> be-Rit a covenant לֵ֠אלֹהֵינוּ <WH430> Le-lo-hei-nu with our God לְהוֹצִ֨יא <WH3318> le-ho-Tzi to put away כָל־ <WH3605> chol all נָשִׁ֜ים <WH802> na-Shim all the wives וְהַנּוֹלָ֤ד <WH3205> ve-han-no-Lad and such as are born מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> me-Hem according בַּעֲצַ֣ת <WH6098> ba-'a-Tzat of them according to the counsel אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH113> 'a-do-Nai, master וְהַחֲרֵדִ֖ים <WH2730> ve-ha-cha-re-Dim and of those that tremble בְּמִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> be-mitz-Vat at the commandment אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; of our God וְכַתּוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> ve-chat-to-Rah according to the law יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> ye-'a-Seh. and let it be done

ק֛וּם <WH6965> kum Arise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עָלֶ֥יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha is your responsibility הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var for [this] matter וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu ourselves עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach; will be with חֲזַ֖ק <WH2388> cha-Zak [belongeth] unto thee we also [will be] with thee be of good courage וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <WH6213> va-'a-Seh. and do פ Peh

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom Then arose עֶזְרָ֡א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra Ezra וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> vai-yash-Ba' to swear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵי֩ <WH8269> sa-Rei and made the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim the Levites וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, and all Israel לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot that they should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> kad-da-Var according to this word הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh to this וַיִּשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7650> vai-yish-sha-Ve-'u. And they sware

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom rose up עֶזְרָ֗א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra, Then Ezra מִלִּפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei from before בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech and went אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into לִשְׁכַּ֖ת <WH3957> lish-Kat into the chamber יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3076> ye-ho-cha-Nan of Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶלְיָשִׁ֑יב <WH475> 'el-ya-Shiv; of Eliashib וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> Sham, there לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem no bread לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor אָכַל֙ <WH398> 'a-Chal thither he did eat וּמַ֣יִם <WH4325> u-Ma-yim water לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor שָׁתָ֔ה <WH8354> sha-Tah, nor drink כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for מִתְאַבֵּ֖ל <WH56> mit-'ab-Bel for he mourned עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over מַ֥עַל <WH4604> Ma-'al because of the transgression הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> hag-go-Lah. of them that had been carried away ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <WH5674> vai-ya-'a-Vi-ru made ק֜וֹל <WH6963> Kol A proclamation בִּיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> bi-hu-Dah throughout Judah וִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim, and Jerusalem לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> le-Chol to all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto all the children הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> hag-go-Lah, of the captivity לְהִקָּבֵ֖ץ <WH6908> le-hik-ka-Vetz that they should gather themselves together יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. unto Jerusalem

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יָב֜וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo And that whosoever would not come לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> lish-Lo-shet within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim, days כַּעֲצַ֤ת <WH6098> ka-'a-Tzat according to the counsel הַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> has-sa-Rim of the princes וְהַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> ve-haz-ze-ke-Nim, and the elders יָחֳרַ֖ם <WH2763> yo-cho-Ram should be forfeited כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all רְכוּשׁ֑וֹ <WH7399> re-chu-Sho; all his substance וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu himself יִבָּדֵ֖ל <WH914> yib-ba-Del and himself separated מִקְּהַ֥ל <WH6951> mik-ke-Hal from the congregation הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> hag-go-Lah. of those that had been carried away ס sa-Mek

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> vai-yik-ka-ve-Tzu gathered themselves together כָל־ <WH3605> chol all אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH376> 'an-shei- the men יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֨ן׀ <WH1144> u-vin-ya-Min and Benjamin יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim unto Jerusalem לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> lish-Lo-shet within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim, days ה֛וּא <WH1931> hu he חֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֖י <WH8671> hat-te-shi-'I It [was] the ninth בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> be-'es-Rim on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh; [day] of the month וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> vai-ye-she-Vu sat כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, and all the people בִּרְחוֹב֙ <WH7339> bir-chOv in the street בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God מַרְעִידִ֥ים <WH7460> mar-'i-Dim trembling עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var because of [this] matter וּמֵהַגְּשָׁמִֽים׃ <WH1653> u-me-hag-ge-sha-Mim. and for the great rain פ Peh

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom stood up עֶזְרָ֤א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, about אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem You מְעַלְתֶּ֔ם <WH4603> me-'al-Tem, unto them Ye have transgressed וַתֹּשִׁ֖יבוּ <WH3427> vat-to-Shi-vu and have taken נָשִׁ֣ים <WH802> na-Shim wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <WH5237> na-che-ri-Yot; strange לְהוֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> le-ho-Sif to increase עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto אַשְׁמַ֥ת <WH819> 'ash-Mat the trespass יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now תְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> te-Nu Now therefore make תוֹדָ֛ה <WH8426> to-Dah confession לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei- God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> 'a-vo-tei-Chem of your fathers וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> va-'a-Su and do רְצוֹנ֑וֹ <WH7522> re-tzo-No; his pleasure וְהִבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <WH914> ve-hib-ba-de-Lu and separate מֵעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> me-'am-Mei yourselves from the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, of the land וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- at הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> han-na-Shim wives הַנָּכְרִיּֽוֹת׃ <WH5237> han-na-che-ri-Yot. and from the strange

וַיַּֽעְנ֧וּ <WH6030> vai-ya'-Nu answered כָֽל־ <WH3605> chol all הַקָּהָ֛ל <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal Then all the congregation וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and said ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol voice גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol; with a loud כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> ken after that; כְּדִבְרֶיךָ ke-div-rei-cha ככִּדְבָרְךָ֥ <WH1697> kid-va-re-Cha act קעָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu is our duty לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> la-'a-Sot. so must we do

אֲבָ֞ל <WH61> 'a-Val But הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people רָב֙ <WH7227> rav [are] many וְהָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> ve-ha-'Et and [it is] a time גְּשָׁמִ֔ים <WH1653> ge-sha-Mim, of much rain וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein are not כֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> Ko-ach and we are not able לַעֲמ֣וֹד <WH5975> la-'a-Mod to stand בַּח֑וּץ <WH2351> ba-Chutz; without וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <WH4399> ve-ham-me-la-Chah, neither [is this] a work לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor לְי֤וֹם <WH3117> le-Yom day אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad of one וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo Nor לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <WH8147> lish-Na-yim, or two כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הִרְבִּ֥ינוּ <WH7235> hir-Bi-nu for we are many לִפְשֹׁ֖עַ <WH6586> lif-Sho-a' that have transgressed בַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> bad-da-Var in this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

יַֽעֲמְדוּ־ <WH5975> ya-'am-du- stand נָ֣א <WH4994> na Let שָׂ֠רֵינוּ <WH8269> rei-nu Let now our rulers לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol the whole הַקָּהָ֞ל <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal of all the congregation וְכֹ֣ל׀ <WH3605> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher those בֶּעָרֵ֗ינוּ <WH5892> be-'a-Rei-nu, in our cities הַהֹשִׁ֞יב <WH3427> ha-ho-Shiv and let all them which have taken נָשִׁ֤ים <WH802> na-Shim wives נָכְרִיּוֹת֙ <WH5237> na-che-ri-yOt strange יָבֹא֙ <WH935> ya-Vo come לְעִתִּ֣ים <WH6256> le-'it-Tim times מְזֻמָּנִ֔ים <WH2163> me-zum-ma-Nim, at appointed וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <WH5973> ve-'im-ma-Hem together זִקְנֵי־ <WH2205> zik-nei- and with them the elders עִ֥יר <WH5892> 'ir of every city וָעִ֖יר <WH5892> va-'Ir city וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יהָ <WH8199> ve-sho-fe-Tei-ha; and the judges עַ֠ד <WH5704> 'ad until לְהָשִׁ֞יב <WH7725> le-ha-Shiv be turned חֲר֤וֹן <WH2740> cha-Ron thereof until the fierce אַף־ <WH639> 'af- wrath אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu, at עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad account לַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> lad-da-Var for this matter הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. of this פ Peh

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> 'ach Only יוֹנָתָ֧ן <WH3129> yo-na-Tan Only Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֲשָׂהאֵ֛ל <WH6214> 'a-sa-h-'El of Asahel וְיַחְזְיָ֥ה <WH3167> ve-yach-ze-Yah and Jahaziah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son תִּקְוָ֖ה <WH8616> tik-Vah of Tikvah עָמְד֣וּ <WH5975> 'a-me-Du were employed עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and זֹ֑את <WH2063> Zot; with וּמְשֻׁלָּ֛ם <WH4918> u-me-shul-Lam about this [matter] and Meshullam וְשַׁבְּתַ֥י <WH7678> ve-shab-be-Tai and Shabbethai הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> hal-le-Vi the Levite עֲזָרֻֽם׃ <WH5826> 'a-za-Rum. helped
